_header: On Easter day in the dawing Jesu rose fro death to life
_description: The Story of the Resurrection based upon the South English Legendary

CULDd11.First Lines:
On Esterne day in þe dawingihesu ros fro deth to
                    lyueblissid be þat ilke tidingwho so him louid þei were ful
                    briþe…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& gaderid þe disciplis ageynþat in wide londis
                    were þan brouht
CULDd11.Note:
In this MS, break between this and the following 2647 is 4 lines earlier,
                    ending, ‘In Galile þei schul me fynde’.

BLCottVesAIII.First Lines:
On sononday in þe daghyngHe ros fro ded to
                    liue…
BLCottVesAIII.Last Lines: Thole ded & rise thriddayand bring til end his dede
BLCottVesAIII.Note: Inserted in one MS of Cursor Mundi.
